channel.title: Specs
channel.description: What computer specs do you guys have? I've got a pretty decent desktop that has a better pc rating than my dad's laptop. Whenever I play on my desktop I lag like a bitch even on the lowest graphics setting. Thoughts on how I can increase performance on my desktop?

item.title: Specs
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

Everyone should get a high FPS but because of Jagex’s failed bot update, you can’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Specs
item.dc:creator: @siden siden
item.description:
@siden wrote:

I get at maximum 5 fps

Read full topic

item.title: Specs
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

@m1lk,
Well you should be fine, reccomended is for smooth gameplay. If its lag as in your ping its you, the fps issue defo seems Rs but of course there are other possible factors but Rs themselves have admitted to it being a problem.
I myself used to always be on 50fps about 2-3months ago so yeah theres a big difference. Rs are working to fix it though, eventually it’ll get fixed. I heard when Rs did the bot nuke they made there code less efficient as they made it faar more complex so that might be why.

Read full topic

item.title: Specs
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:10, topic:435532”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=538255.msg3937762#msg3937762 date=1331168092]

Already changed priority. I’ve got a 1gb gfx card. Shouldn’t lag this much… I’ll check out Game Booster

Rs should run for you perfectly fine then, since its your fps it’d either be your computer or Rs itself/your software on your computer. Hm, how do other games work? Whats your proccessor usage % like when you run Rs?

It’s like 60%.

I don’t really lag when I run Age of Empires
[/quote]
Well unless theres another piece of software clashing with Rs or something to with rs or corrupt data its Rs’s problem and theres not too much you can do about it ;o. Sorry to be the bearer of bad news D:

  • check the specs of age of empires so you know where you stand with your capability. I.e. if it lags a lot = barely got the min if it runs fine you’ve got the reccomended+ if you can use any option and run other things its brill + check your cpu and ram usage while its running so you can have a better idea.

But I think its rs.[/quote]

I’ve got the recommended and a little extra. There was a time when Runescape didn’t lag like crazy

Read full topic

I don’t really lag when I run Age of Empires[/quote]
Well unless theres another piece of software clashing with Rs or something to with rs or corrupt data its Rs’s problem and theres not too much you can do about it ;o. Sorry to be the bearer of bad news D:

  • check the specs of age of empires so you know where you stand with your capability. I.e. if it lags a lot = barely got the min if it runs fine you’ve got the reccomended+ if you can use any option and run other things its brill + check your cpu and ram usage while its running so you can have a better idea.

But I think its rs.

item.title: Specs
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:5, topic:435532”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=538255.msg3937742#msg3937742 date=1331166981]

I used to always be on 50fps even on hd till fps issues to do with rs they said they’ll be fixing soon so it’ll be fine. I can play bf3 etc perfectly fine so its rs. My computers getting old now though, I’ll upgrade like next year
[/quote]

Ok cus mines slightly worse so can u link me to the fps issue thread or whatever they call it?[/quote]
I can still run rs perfectly fine though, I can have bf3 playing while a bots on(2 bots at same time doesnt work as it lags fps wise but 2 rs at the same time works fine) atm i’m getting around a 30fps-35fps. I have a 1.5gb graphics card though(2010 gaming pc lol) and fps is linked to your graphics card. as you can see>

it says it on the home page somewhere, I think march behind the scenes.
Try using game booster(made by iobit I think), it’ll pause things you aren’t using so you can get the most out of your pc while you play. also change the priority in your task manager to high for java.
Do this to check your gfx card.

Read full topic
